general_advisory: Farmers are advised to conduct harvesting, sowing, and spraying operations according to the weather conditions. They should also take care of crops and animals to protect them from the cold. Sowing of Rabi crops like Mustard, Til, Chickpea, Groundnut, Green gram/Black Gram should be completed.

advisory: There is some rainfall expected in the first half of the upcoming days, so farmers are advised to wait for harvesting operations and store the paddy in safe places to avoid damage.
Farmers should start field preparation for summer rice cultivation and choose improved varieties for cultivation.
Seed treatment is recommended before sowing green gram/black gram crops.
Avoid irrigation for some days due to expected rainfall.
Varieties like Kamadeva, Durga, Prasada, Usala, etc., can be used.
Use improved groundnut varieties for sowing.
Ensure seed treatment before sowing and treat with bacteria or phospho culture.
Use straw mulching material in vegetable crops to maintain soil moisture and temperature.
Regular monitoring for Diamond back moth attack is recommended.
Protect animals from cold by using jute bags and provide clean drinking water.
Vaccination and deworming should be performed.
Ensure proper ventilation and heat source in poultry sheds.
Maintain suitable drinking water temperature for poultry.
